item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 3, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. DuckDuckGo Donates $25,000 to the Perl and Raku Foundation (139 points | 58 comments)
2. Tweaking Stunt Island's 30-year-old 3D Engine (96 points | 21 comments)
3. Launch HN: Vocera (YC F24) – Testing and Observability for Voice AI (12 points | 2 comments)
4. Dependency management fatigue, or why I forever ditched React for Go+Htmx+Templ (70 points | 38 comments)
5. Broadcom loses another big VMware customer (27 points | 8 comments)
6. Stack Auth (YC S24), the open-source Auth0 alternative, is hiring Founding SWEs ( | hide)
7. Lessons I learned working at an art gallery (335 points | 130 comments)
8. USC Student Rocket Group Shatters International Amateur Space Record (167 points | 140 comments)
9. 'I'm running a Mud so I can learn C programming ' (1993) (31 points | 20 comments)
10. My domain registrar (DNSimple) tried to 5x the cost of my reseller plan (45 points | 25 comments)
11. Rust in QEMU Roadmap (173 points | 68 comments)
12. Vintage digicams aren't just a fad. They're an artistic statement (55 points | 118 comments)
13. Show HN: Copper – Open-source robotics in Rust with deterministic log replay (147 points | 29 comments)
14. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (December 2024) (336 points | 310 comments)
15. The Last Viridian Note (2008) (11 points | 3 comments)
16. Distributed Erlang (138 points | 40 comments)
17. Fish have a brain microbiome – could humans have one too? (305 points | 120 comments)
18. An English castle became a stork magnet (54 points | 13 comments)
19. Stripe Black Friday Dashboard (Physical Machine) (22 points | 13 comments)
20. Two decades after Enron's bankruptcy, the company is back as a crypto firm? (44 points | 25 comments)
21. World Labs: Generate 3D worlds from a single image (429 points | 130 comments)
22. Why Phishers Love New TLDs Like .shop, .top and .xyz (50 points | 71 comments)
23. Learn perfect pitch in 15 years (128 points | 111 comments)
24. Every board game rulebook is awful [pdf] (304 points | 253 comments)
25. Show HN: Flow – A dynamic task engine for building AI agents (139 points | 44 comments)
26. Show HN: my party game where AI decides if you’re funny (62 points | 34 comments)
27. Evidence of the use of silk by Bronze Age civilization (154 points | 59 comments)
28. Y Combinator and Power in Silicon Valley (249 points | 123 comments)
29. Bioluminescent wood using the white rot fungus desarmillaria tabescens (121 points | 25 comments)
30. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (December 2024) (148 points | 314 comments)
